column2: "Ah, it's you! Remember to always stay alert. When fighting Darkers, carelessness could be fatal."
"Since natives lack the power of Photons, they are easily corrupted and used as the Darkers' advance guards... if the infection is left unchecked."
"Preventing that is our job as ARKS. It might seem cruel, but we must purge all infected natives."
"I, too, was once full of hesitation. Slaying these creatures in the form of natives weighs heavily on my conscience."

"Just as I was struck with reservations as a young lad, it was his words that helped me.
\"Jean, we have to save them...\""
